Module Documentaiton¶

Rig Parts¶

Available rig parts. These modules are all located under rigBot.parts

bipedArm¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

bipedLeg¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

fkChain¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

foot¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

hand¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

neck¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

piston¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

splineChain¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

tongue¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

torso¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

worldRoot¶

See also

For building guides and their respective rigs use guide.build, skel.build and rig.build

Rig Build Modules¶

env¶

Functions for setting and querying asset / variant environment.

guide¶

Functions for building guide rigs, creating new part modules and migrating parts to the asset.

skel¶

Functions for building a skeleton.

rig¶

Functions for building rigs.

Asset Specific Modules¶

asset.rigAll¶

For now this is a master build list to build all rig parts, import your latest model and load any deformers. This file lives in the ${ASSET}//rigbuild directory

Warning

This will eventually change to allow for better UI introspection.

asset.custom¶

This is an asset specific custom build script to insert custom code into your build. This file lives in the ${ASSET}/rigbuild directory.

Deformers & Data¶

The data module allows you to save and load data for either a whole asset, which saves data to the asset’s data folder OR you can save and load standalone files.

Scroll down to see what data types are supported.

data¶

data.attributes¶

data.blendShape¶

data.cluster¶

data.connections¶

data.constraints¶

data.controlShapes¶

data.deltaMush¶

data.lattice¶

data.nonLinear¶

data.pose¶

data.sculpt¶

data.sdk¶

data.skinCluster¶

data.stack¶

Utilites & Tools¶

utils¶

Assorted utilies.

control¶

Functions for creating and modifying animation controls.

ikChain¶

Functions for working with ik joint chains.

spline¶

Functions for working with spline setups. (Uses cmRigNodes plugin. Optionally build using vanilla Maya.)

spaces¶

Functions for setting up animation control spaces.

rivet¶

Create rivets on poly meshes and nurbs surfaces
